what we have -> for : 1
we have for -> you : 1
have for you -> next : 1
for you next -> in : 1
you next in -> february : 1
next in february -> luck : 1
in february luck -> by : 1
february luck by -> linda : 1
luck by linda -> lael : 1
by linda lael -> winter : 1
linda lael winter -> lodge : 1
lael winter lodge -> by : 1
winter lodge by -> susan : 1
lodge by susan -> home : 1
by susan home -> by : 1
susan home by -> sherryl : 1
home by sherryl -> of : 1
by sherryl of -> volume : 1
sherryl of volume -> one : 1
of volume one -> by : 1
volume one by -> debbie : 1
one by debbie -> giveaway : 1
by debbie giveaway -> by : 1
debbie giveaway by -> brenda : 1
giveaway by brenda -> ties : 1
by brenda ties -> book : 1
brenda ties book -> possession : 1
ties book possession -> by : 1
book possession by -> jennifer : 1
possession by jennifer -> bait : 1
by jennifer bait -> and : 1
jennifer bait and -> bbq : 1
bait and bbq -> by : 1
and bbq by -> pamela : 1
bbq by pamela -> of : 1
by pamela of -> fate : 1
pamela of fate -> by : 1
of fate by -> jayne : 1
fate by jayne -> ann : 1
by jayne ann -> nymph : 1
jayne ann nymph -> king : 1
ann nymph king -> by : 1
nymph king by -> gena : 1
king by gena -> desire : 1
by gena desire -> by : 1
gena desire by -> margaret : 1
desire by margaret -> by : 1
by margaret by -> jennifer : 1
margaret by jennifer -> by : 1
by jennifer by -> roxane : 1
jennifer by roxane -> dating : 1
by roxane dating -> by : 1
roxane dating by -> nancy : 1
dating by nancy -> under : 1
by nancy under -> caution : 1
nancy under caution -> by : 1
under caution by -> gina : 1
caution by gina -> zone : 1
by gina zone -> by : 1
gina zone by -> debra : 1
